entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android losing fonts #25540
  • [0:] Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Element: Warning: The RealParent on Microsoft.Maui.Controls.VerticalStackLayout has been Garbage Collected. This should never happen. Please log a bug: https://github.com/dotnet/maui #25538

Closed

  • [OneLoc] Localization of templates and resources files #20515
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [Net8.0] Enable test samples with net6 and net7 #11608
    Backlog
  • [testing] Xharness fails to run locally #21080
    Backlog
  • MAUI CI build hangs when running on ARM Apple M machines #21727
    Backlog
  • Inconsistent Debugging with MultiValueConverterExtension crash #25212

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] RadioButton throws CGContextSetLineWidth - Fix #25542
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton
  • [iOS] ScrollView's Gradient Background fix #25541
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr10] Fix Button Regression with null image source #25528

Updated

  • [Android] Added a scroll bar for collection view #25471
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Add missing android font weight #25437
    platform/android 🤖, area-fonts, community ✨
  • [iOS] Only invalidate ancestors upon MeasureInvalidated #25465
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] CarouselView: Remove rounding from SizedItemContentView that results in off-by-one pixel error #25411
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator, .NET 9 SR1
  • Add support for iOS/Mac specific modals styled as popovers #23984
    community ✨, area-controls-modal
  • Fixed crash when calling ItemsView.ScrollTo on unloaded CollectionView #25444
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • Swipe view improvements #25233
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [iOS] Pasting long text when the editor has a max length #23877
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-editor
